Classic late-Blizzard quality. Cash shop, shallow gameplay, end product of ignoring player feedback, outlet for their preferred political agenda. 3-map PVE mission pack for 15EUR after scrapping years of development. This is current year's B tier Zinga facebook game. No moderation ingame, during the match do one thing wrong and you will be called anything between a nigger and a faggot. I'd write it's falling down hard but the truth is that the game is lying on the floor for multiple years now. They somehow managed to make a game make you feel worse after playing it for fun. The "Overwatch" you are looking for is called Valorant sadly. Or even TF2, whatever you like

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

So glad i get to finally write a review, i just uninstalled the game today on blizzard aswell. The only reason i played this horrible game recently was because the prop hunt was somewhat enjoyable. But on to the biggest issue is that ever since Blizzard was bought out. Seems like they whore themselves on a seasonal pay scale just like C.O.D. Every time you like something about any of their games, they take it away and say "Youre having fun wrong". I will in the future stay away from these games. They have a huge problem of fixing what is not broken.
PS: 3 missions for 15 bucks.... nah
